titleStmt.title: An introduction to the loue of God. Accompted among the workes of S. Augustine, and set forth in his name, very profitable to moue all men to loue God for his benefits receaued
titleStmt.author: Simard, Marie Ange, attributed name.
Freake, Edmund, ca. 1516-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Purfoote, dwelling in Paules Church yarde at the signe of the Lucres,

notesStmt.note: Probably not, in fact, by Saint Augustine.
Dedication signed: Edmund Roffen (i.e. Edmund Freake, Bp. of Rochester).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church yarde at the signe of the Lucres
